Html:
Hi,

I was wondering if it is possible to do have custom objects on the overlay that could be mvoed around, etc? Here's an example of what I want:

http://s903.photobucket.com/albums/ac235/gordon_matt/

In the image above, there is a "slice of pie" shape that a user can swing clockwise or anti-clockwise around a central marker. Is this possible with GMaps? If so, how would I go about it?

Cheers
in wpf version you can create control and just use it as markers shape, the control can be anything

Thanks, radioman. I haven't looked at the WPF version just yet, but the app I am writing is a plugin for an existing WinForms application, so no can do... although I am sure I have heard something somewhere about interopability between WinForms and WPF... that a WPF user control can be used in WinForms... but I need to double check on that when I have time.

Thanks
